mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TBL_RESERVATION WHERE USER_NO = (SELECT USER_NO FROM TBL_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId})
DELETE FROM TBL_INQUIRY WHERE USER_NO = (SELECT USER_NO FROM TBL_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT RESERVE_NO AS reserveNo, MACHINE_NO AS machineNo, RESERVE_DATE AS reserveDate, START_TIME AS startTime, RESERVE_OPTION AS reserveOption, RESERVE_PRICE AS reservePrice FROM TBL_RESERVATION WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND RESERVE_STATUS = '예약중' ORDER BY RESERVE_DATE, START_TIME;

SELECT r.RESERVE_NO AS reserveNo, r.MACHINE_NO AS machineNo, r.RESERVE_DATE AS reserveDate, r.START_TIME AS startTime, r.RESERVE_OPTION AS reserveOption, r.RESERVE_PRICE AS reservePrice FROM TBL_RESERVATION r WHERE r.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND r.RESERVE_STATUS = '예약중' ORDER BY r.RESERVE_DATE, r.START_TIME
SELECT QR_CODE FROM TBL_RESERVATION WHERE RESERVE_NO = #{reserveNo} AND RESERVE_STATUS = '예약중'
SELECT RESERVE_NO as reserveNo, QR_CODE as qrCode FROM TBL_RESERVATION WHERE RESERVE_NO = #{reserveNo}
